attributes.action: Review the date for the 4th self employed grant.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the date changing for the 4th self employed grant. Lots of self employed people have not been able to work since the lockdown started in January and are having to survive on no or little income. We have all been waiting patiently for the budget and many of us thought the grant would be open after that was announced. It is so unfair on self employed that we have to wait till the middle of April when we have been forced to stop working. People are struggling to put food on the table and cover there bills. These grants are a lifeline to thousands. Employed people haven’t had to wait for there furlough. Please reconsider the date as many are struggling.
attributes.background: I would like the 4th self employed grant to be in March month not middle of April.

rejection.details:

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
